items.text: short of a length on off, cut with no room to point
items.shortText: Russell to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, pushes it out to point
items.shortText: Russell to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.preText: Tasmeem: "Liton was the most consistent batsman during the miserable test outings and you leave him out for a batsman who hasn't had any footwork in his entire career. SMH."
items.text: a tad short, Shakib jumps and cuts but finds backward point
items.shortText: Russell to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: short, can't get on top of it as he top-edges a pull through square leg
items.postText: 9.50am Rain is seriously heavy now, which means we're off. The groundstaff rushes out with the covers. First of what could be several interruptions through the day. The wind is still strong, so let's see how long this one lasts. There are patches of blue in the sky and the weather seems to be clearing up in the backdrop, but there's no saying anything about the weather in this part of the world. More covers being added to the regions around the mains square, which could only mean one thing - the groundstaff expects this one to be strong and last long. Ananya: "A certain....unmistakable confidence from WI..... hope they sustain this with stronger teams...."
items.shortText: Russell to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.preText: The rain has stopped and the covers are off. We're in for a resumption.

items.text: closes the face and gets an inside edge that lobs towards Holder but lands short of him
